title: React Blog Frontend - Day 1
description: Frontend application for a blogging platform built with React, featuring dynamic routing, modular components, and seamless integration with backend services.

title: React Blog Backend - Day 2
description: Backend services for a blogging platform built with React, providing robust APIs, user authentication, and data management for a seamless blogging experience.

title: Blog Database - MongoDB - Day 3
description: Database integration for a blogging platform using MongoDB, enabling efficient data storage, retrieval, and management for blog posts, user profiles, and comments.

title: Connecting Front end and Back end - Day 4
description: Connecting the frontend and backend of a blogging platform, ensuring seamless communication between user interfaces and server-side functionalities for an integrated user experience.

title: Authentication with Firebase - Day 5
description: User Authentication serves the Major requirement for the blogging platform, Details of that covered.

title: Hosting Fullstack App - Day 6
description: Hosting the Fullstack Application on the internet, Details of that covered.
